sense.def:
A politician's opponents
so drugi politiki, ki pripadajo drugačni stranki ali imajo drugačne cilje in splošno politiko.

Pri igri je
one's opponent
oseba, ki igra proti nam.

seg.quote: He beat his opponent three sets to love.

sense.def:
The opponents of an idea or policy
so ljudje, ki se ne strinjajo z neko zamislijo ali politično usmeritvijo.

seg.quote: ...a leading opponent of the budget cuts.
